turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'm in need of placing a Starbucks pickup order, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let's do that. what drink do you want from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a hot grande cappuccino, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you have a milk preference for your drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 2%, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it. anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that'll be it for me for today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you'd like a hot grande cappuccino with 2% milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did i get that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $3.40 is your total.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That works for me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I'd like to pick up at the 1850 Union Avenue location in Memphis.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I've ordered your drink for you at Starbucks on 1850 union avenue. and it should be ready for pick up in 9 minutes. Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message shortly.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: anything else i can help with today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I'm all set with that. Thank you very much for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're very welcome.
